comments:
Using build 200404071337, when I restarted an existing workspace I got the stack
trace below. That workspace worked fine with the same build yesterday.

org.osgi.framework.BundleException: Exception in
org.eclipse.core.internal.compatibility.PluginActivator.start() of bundle
org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring.
at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java:59)

Nested exception:
org.osgi.framework.BundleException: Legacy plug-in
"org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring" must not be automatically activated on
startup. This is probably caused by a previous crash in Eclipse.

traces.message: Legacy plug-in "org.eclipse.ltk.core.refactoring" must not be automatically activated on startup. This is probably caused by a previous crash in Eclipse.
